column4: so Does anyone has a 915GM graphic card working fine on ubuntu?
Do you have the ATI card in there?
I have the 915PM with the ATI x600 card and all I can say is that it is a headache.
I've yet to find a distro that works on this laptop.  Im usually stuck with vesa and running 1024x768 on a 17" WUXGA :(
